    Schools and Colleges



With 11 different schools/colleges, Chapman University has a path for you no matter your goals or interests. Click on the links under each school/college to explore its undergraduate and graduate programs.
Want to explore all our programs? Visit our Degrees and Programs page.

      Starting Undeclared?
  

        Undergraduate students can start at Chapman without declaring a major. Check out our Undeclared Resources page to learn more.
      


Undeclared Resource Page Â Â»







Explore Degrees and Programs
Looking for a specific program or field of study? Find out if one of our 100+ majors/minors is a good fit for you on our program finder.



  
Build Your Personal Chapman Website!
If you're a potential undergraduate student, just answer a few short questions and we'll create a custom digital viewbook for you. You'll be able to learn more about the college experiences and academic opportunities that matter to you — all in one place.
Create a Custom Viewbook >>
